attributes.additional_details:
Because people who are gay want 'homophobia; banned it is only fair that heterosexuals should also have heterosexualphobia banned and made illegal also.
Not to do so is a form of descrimination in itself because one set of people in socety have gained an advantage over another set of people.
I want all references to; and writings and verbage against heterosexuals banned and made illegal.
It is ludicrous to allow one section of society advantage over another. You either allow discrimation.( which is freedom to choose or you ban it) What do you prefer; Freedom or Dicatatorship?
